general_advisory: Drain out excess water from paddy field, maintain regular surveillance for disease pests, maintain appropriate planting conditions, follow specific pest control measures for each crop, provide necessary care and treatments for animal health

advisory: Perform regular surveillance for disease pests and take control strategies
For blast infestation, spray Tebuconazole 50% + Trifloxystrobin 25% WG @ 80 g/acre in water, repeat every 7-10 days
For Thrips infestation, spray Azadirachtin or Lambda-cyhy alothrin as per instructions
Collect disease-free setts from healthy plants, treat before planting
Manage sett rot disease with recommended drench or spray treatments
Remove infected plants in ratoon crop, apply recommended fertilizers and spraying
Spray Tebuconazole + Sulphur to reduce incidence of Powdery mildew, Anthracnose & Stem rot
Control aphids with Neem Based Pesticide and Thiamethoxam or Acetamiprid as needed
Control aphids by spraying Dimethoate 30% EC
Control Mustard Sawfly, Leaf Webber, and Tobacco Caterpillar with Neem Oil and other recommended treatments
Minimize damage by Red Pumpkin Beetle with Acephate and neem oil formulation
Control Epilachna Beetle in cucumber with neem-based pesticide or chemical sprays
Start sowing tomato seeds for summer cultivation, take preventive measures for wilting
Treat white spot disease in fish by bathing affected fish in saltwater mix
Provide necessary care for fish health and disease prevention
Regularly provide mineral mixture and salt to animals, include wheat grains and jaggery in daily ration for energy
